Game: Z-Type

01 Oct 2011

[caption id="attachment_3311" align="aligncenter" width="168" caption="Z-Type"][/caption]

Go to the Game: www.phoboslab.org/ztype Task: Survive as long as possible How to play: Type the words which appear at the top as fast as possible. The ship shoots at the words. My Record: Final Score: 1505 with Accuracy of 94.2% Programming: This game is written in JavaScript with Impact.
